table:
INSERT INTO council_projects (council_id, council_code, apply_id, project_code, project_name, risk_secretary_quit, risk_secretary_quit_mark, one_vote_down, one_vote_down_mark, project_vote_result, compere_message, judges_count, pass_count, notpass_count, quit_count, sort_order, raw_add_time) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
UPDATE council_projects SET council_id=?, council_code=?, apply_id = ?, project_code=?, project_name=?, risk_secretary_quit=?, risk_secretary_quit_mark=?, one_vote_down=?, one_vote_down_mark=?, project_vote_result=?, compere_message=?, judges_count=?, pass_count=?, notpass_count=?, quit_count=?, sort_order=? WHERE id=?
SELECT * FROM council_projects WHERE id=?
SELECT * FROM council_projects WHERE id=? for update
SELECT * FROM council_projects WHERE apply_id=? order by raw_add_time desc
SELECT * FROM council_projects WHERE project_code=? order by id desc
SELECT * FROM council_projects WHERE project_code=? and council_id=?
SELECT * FROM council_projects WHERE project_code=? and council_id=? for update
SELECT * FROM council_projects WHERE council_id=? order by sort_order
projectCode
SELECT * FROM council_projects WHERE council_code=? order by sort_order
DELETE FROM council_projects WHERE id=?
DELETE FROM council_projects WHERE council_id=?
DELETE FROM council_projects WHERE council_code=?
